review: Worked very well for two months, then became erratic. Eventually it was unusable.Update:  Well, I spoke to customer service (Opal) and was told a replacement would be sent.  How can you not be happy with Amazon?Second update. I received a replacement and it works very well. It's my go to for home music since my TV has surround sound. The whole transaction had only a "speed bump" and I'm pleased with the product and the purchase.
